main event: A civilian reported seeing a white, star-shaped object approximately 10 feet long in Massillon, Ohio on July 9, 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 minutes but details about what initially attracted attention were unclear,The report indicated inconsistencies regarding the object's size and altitude,The sighting took place at 0421 Z, which corresponds to 11:21 P.M. local time,There was no photograph or physical evidence found related to the sighting,An MCIC center was contacted but no further reliable information was provided.
